thread.title: Nike Is Releasing an Anniversary Edition Air Max 1 OG Celebrating 30 Years of Air Max
thread.title_full: Nike Is Releasing an Anniversary Edition Air Max 1 OG Celebrating 30 Years of Air Max

author: Aaron Howes
title: Nike Is Releasing an Anniversary Edition Air Max 1 OG Celebrating 30 Years of Air Max
text:
Visit the original post to see all 7 images from this gallery. 
Tinker Hatfield first made the controversial decision to expose Air-cushioning technology with the Air Max 1 three decades ago. To celebrate its approaching birthday, also known as Air Max Day, Nike is releasing the new Air Max 1 OG Anniversary edition.
The shoe famously revolutionized the sneaker industry and inaugurated one of the most influential sneaker series ever. The Anniversary model is a reworked throwback to the original designed with the latest cushioning technology.

You’ll be able to cop the design in two of the three original iconic colorways—classic white, red and gray, and white, blue and gray—as of today. Check out the Nike website for more information.
More Info Find out about everything Highsnobiety is doing to celebrate Air Max Day and check out our Snobshots competition for a chance to be featured on our website and Instagram.
